article.title: atman
article.text:
{{conceptdab|date=March 2017}}
'''Atman''' may refer to:

==Religion==
* [[Ātman (Jainism)]], a philosophical term used within Jainism to identify the soul
* [[Ātman (Hinduism)]], meaning "self, soul", a philosophical concept common to all schools of Hindu philosophy
* [[Ātman (Buddhism)]], a reference to the essential self
** [[Anatta]] — "not-self", central concept in Buddhism

* [[Atman jnana]]

==Art and Culture==
* [[Atman (fashion)]]
* [[Atman (film)|''Atman'' (film)]], a 1997 documentary film by Pirjo Honkasalo
* [[Pavel Atman]] (born 1987), Russian handball player

==See also==
{{wiktionary|atman}}
* [[Ataman]], a title of Cossack and haidamak leaders of various kinds
* [[World Soul (disambiguation)]]
* [[Atma (disambiguation)]]
* [[Divine soul (disambiguation)]]

{{disambiguation|surname}}
